cards.name: Potion of Climbing
cards.summary: When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour.  During this time, you have advantage on Strength(Athletics) checks you make to climb.  The potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resemvling bands of stone.  Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

cards.name: Potions of Fire Breath
cards.summary: After drinking this potion, you can use a bonus action to exhale fire at a target within 30ft of you. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The effect ends after you exhale the fire 3 times or when 1hr has passed. This orange liquid flickers, and smoke fills the top of the container and wafts out whenever it is opened.

cards.name: Potion of Gaseous Form
cards.summary: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the gaseous form spell for 1hr (no concentration required) or until you end the effect as a bonus action. This potion's container seems to hold fog that moves and pours like water.

cards.name: Potions of Hill Giant Strength
cards.summary: When you drink this potion, your strenth score changes to 21 for 1hr. The potion has no effect if your Strength is equal to or greater than the effect. This potion's transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of a fingernail from a Hill Giant.

cards.name: Potions of Growth
cards.summary: When you drink this potion, you gain the enlarge effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4hrs (no concentration required). The red in the potion's liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts. Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

cards.name: Potions of Healing
cards.summary:
When you drink these potions, you health according to the below.
Healing: 2d4 + 2
Greater Healing: 4d4 + 4
Superior Healing: 8d4 + 8
Supreme Healing: 10d4 + 20

cards.name: Potions of Heroism
cards.summary: For 1hr after drinking it, you gain 10 temporary hit points that last for 1hr. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the Bless Spell (no concentration required). This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

cards.name: Potions of Resistance
cards.summary: When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to one type of damage for 1hr. DM chooses or determines it randomly from the options listed in the book.

cards.name: Amulet of the Ethereal Plane
cards.summary: When the Amulet is used, it enables the user to traverse the Ethereal Plane for up to 10min.  When in the Ethereal Plane they can observe and listen to anything on the Material Plane, but are unable to interact with it. While under this effect, your physical body goes limp. The Amulet can be used 1 time per Long Rest.

cards.name: Amulet of Firebolt
cards.summary: While you wear this amulet, you can cast the Fire Bolt spell as an action with a +1 spell attack bonus. The amulet has 3 charges which reset after a Long Rest.  If multiple charges are used for one attack, roll an extra damage die per extra charge.

cards.name: Boots of ElvenKind
cards.summary: While you wear these boots, your steps make no sound, regardless of the surface you are moving across. You also have advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

cards.name: Boots of Fast Walking
cards.summary: While you wear these boots, you gain a +10 to your walking speed

cards.name: Boots of Speed
cards.summary: While you wear these boots, you can use a bonus action and click the boots' heels together. If you do, the boots double your walking speed, and any creature that makes an opportunity attack against you has disadvantage on the attack roll. If you click your heels together again, you end the effect. When the boots' property has been used for a total of 10min, the magic ceases to function until you finish a long rest.

cards.name: Circlet of Concentration
cards.summary: When attuned this allows a spellcaster to concentrate on two spells at once. If they fail a concentration check they lose both spells.

cards.name: Cloak of Displacement
cards.summary: While you wear this cloak, it projects an illusion that you appear to be standing in a place near your actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. If you take damage, the property ceases to function until the start of your next turn.  This property is suppressed while you are incapacitated, restrained, or otherwise unable to move.

cards.name: Clothes of Mending
cards.summary: You gain +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak.

cards.name: Clothes of Protection
cards.summary: This elegant outfit of traveler's clothes magically mends itself to counteract daily wear and tear. Pieces of the outfit that are destroyed can't be repaired this way.

cards.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
cards.summary: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlests. They have no effect on you if your Strength is already 19 or higher.

cards.name: Goggles of Night
cards.summary: While wearing these dark lenses, you have darkvision out to a range of 60ft. If you already have darkvision, wearing the goggles increases its range by 60ft.

cards.name: Hat of Disguise
cards.summary: While wearing this hat, you can use an action to cast the Disguise Self spell from it at will.  The spell ends if the hat is removed.

cards.name: Javelin of Lightning
cards.summary: This javelin is a magic weapon. When you hurl it and speak its command word, it transforms into a bolt of lightning, forming a line 5ft wide that extends out from you to a target within 120ft. Each creature in the line excluding you and the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 lightning damage on a successful one. The ligtning bolt turns back into a javelin when it reaches the target. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes damage from the javelin plus 4d6 lightning damage. The javelin's property can't be used again until the next dawn. In the meantime, the javelin can still be used as a magic weapon.

cards.name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
cards.summary: You have advantage on saving throws against spells while you wear this cloak.

cards.name: Veteran's Cane
cards.summary: When you grasp this walking cane and use a bonus action to speak the command word, it transforms into an ordinary longsword and ceases to be magical.

cards.name: Ring of the Evasion
cards.summary: This ring has 3 charges, and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. When you fail a Dexterity saving throw while wearing it, you can use your reaction to expend 1 of its charges to succeed on that saving throw instead.

cards.name: Ring of Invisibility
cards.summary:
While wearing this ring you can turn invisible as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you. You remain invisible until the ring is removed, until you attack or cast a spell, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.
Can be used 3 times per Long Rest

cards.name: Ring of the Ram
cards.summary:
This ring has 3 charges, and it regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can use an action to expend 1 to 3 of its charges to attack one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The ring produces a spectral ram's head and makes its attack roll with a +7 bonus. On a hit, for each charge you spend, the target takes 2d10 force damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
Alternatively, you can expend 1 to 3 of the ring's charges as an action to try to break an object you can see within 60 feet of you that isn't being worn or carried. The ring makes a Strength check with a +5 bonus for each charge you spend.

cards.name: Ring of Resistance
cards.summary: You have resistance to one damage type while wearing this ring. The gem in the ring indicates the type, which the DM chooses or determines randomly. [Refer to the book]

cards.name: Ring of Spell Storage
cards.summary: This ring stores 1 spell cast into it. The spell may be of level 6 or below. While wearing this ring, you can cast any spell stored in it. The spell uses the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster, but otherwise treated as if you cast the spell. The spell cast from the ring is no longer stored in it, freeing up space.

cards.name: The Pointer
cards.summary: This amulet of a hand when used casts the Detect Magic Spell. The hand begins to float and points in the direction of the strongest source of magic in a 30ft radius from itself.
